title: Hyper G1
summary: The Hyper G1 is a Tier 1 semi-automatic pistol that can be obtained from Various Ai shops, or found in loot boxes from Graveyards. It could be upgraded into the Hyper G2.
full_text:
Hyper G1
The Hyper G1 is a Tier 1 semi-automatic pistol that can be obtained from Various Ai shops, or found in loot boxes from Graveyards. It could be upgraded into the Hyper G2.
